meanings.definition: An area of shrubby vegetation in southwestern North America.
meanings.sent1: The chaparral was filled with small bushes and trees.
meanings.sent2: Hikers enjoyed exploring the chaparral on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The rabbits in the chaparral had a secret dance party.
meanings.sent4: The chaparral stood like a fortress against the desert winds.
meanings.sent5: The chaparral hummed with the songs of hidden birds.

meanings.definition: A type of vegetation characterized by dense, woody shrubs.
meanings.sent1: The chaparral provided shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The dense chaparral made it hard to see through.
meanings.sent3: The chaparral whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent4: The chaparral was a maze of green walls in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The scent of chaparral filled the air after the rain.
